name: HMU Academy: Rethinking Decoupling & De-escalation
description:
We will be discussing the barriers regarding changing or ending partnerships, and how to move through them in new and imaginative ways.

The idea of ending or even changing a relationship dynamic with someone, is terrifying, partly because we fear losing someone we have grown intimate with and because of the messaging we've received about romantic partnerships from the dominant culture leading us to view breaking up, or even a relationship taking on a different form, as the relationship failing. This idea keeps people in relationship dynamics that are no longer serving them, barring them from their own authentic needs and desires.

Championing our own autonomy and our partner's(s) is crucial, in welcoming shifts to our relationships if something is not working for us.

This workshop dives into the emotional and tangible impact of major relationship shifts, and how to move them with compassion, grace and self assuredness.

Key Takeaways:

\-Tools on how to initiate and welcome ALL major changes in relationships

\-Deepened understanding of the "relationship escalator" and how it influences why we stay in relationship structures that no longer serve us

\-Templates, ceremonies and rituals on how to have a conscious, proactive and loving decoupling

**About Your Instructors**

Bear (he/him) & Fifi (all pronouns) are New York City-based Intimacy Coaches, Community Consultants, Event Producers, and Educators. Their work challenges social binaries and standards, addresses the personal barriers that limit human connection, and offers alternative ways of relating that center consent & safety, authenticity, and personal agency on an interpersonal and collective scale. [Follow them on IG here](https://www.instagram.com/bearxfifi/).

name: Queer Kiss & Cuddles - A Bi/Pansexual+ Experience!
description:
**Queer Kiss & Cuddles - A Bi/Pansexual+ Experience! 7pm-10pm (May go longer depending on energy)**

**_Address given in confirmation email additional info, Elevator access_**

**Facilitated by** [Dominus Eros](https://www.dominuseros.com/)

**Join us in an intimate embrace of beautiful and communal energy!**

Queer Kiss & Cuddles is an inclusive gathering that radiates warmth, acceptance, and the vibrant spirit of the LGBTQIA+ community. In a beautiful and warm energetic space, attendees converge to celebrate love in all its forms. Here, affection knows no boundaries as individuals of diverse backgrounds come together to share tender kisses, comforting embraces, and genuine connections. It's a sanctuary where everyone is encouraged to express their authentic selves without fear of judgment, fostering a sense of belonging and empowerment within a safe and welcoming environment.

Throughout the event, laughter mingles with whispered conversations and the gentle sound of embraces, creating an atmosphere of joy and camaraderie. Whether exchanging playful pecks on the cheek or sharing heartfelt cuddles, each interaction is a testament to the power of love to transcend differences and unite people in solidarity. As the night unfolds, memories are made, friendships are forged, and the bonds of community grow stronger, leaving a lasting impression of acceptance, love, and the beauty of queer expression.

In addition to the spirit of the event we will have guided meditation and sound bath cuddle puddles. Spiritual connection enhances an already proven healer in hugs/touch via cuddles and opportunities for a fun and flirty kisses arise in a cultivated container of queer joy.

_Note: This a Queer LGTBQIA+ Centered experience with focus on Bi/Pansexual+ interactions, which if you are curious/questioning we welcome you to explore in an intentional safety forward space and celebrated loving atmosphere._

**The Workshop Experience:** This is an in-person workshop/gathering in a beautiful and private studio space in Manhattan (near Herald Square). The workshop will include 3 hours of mingling, getting to know your fellow humans, spiritual portions mixed in with kiss and cuddles experience.

**Desired Benefits:** You will gain new ways to connect and bond with yourself and your fellow humans. You will be able to connect and explore your own relationship to this practice and all the yummy sensations possible. Opt in event meaning you only do what you feel comfortable with.

*   Introductions, mingling and affirmations
*   Safety protocol, negotiations, and aftercare discussed
*   Varied offerings to how your cuddle/touch experience can be explored
*   Fun and flirty kissing styles are discussed with opportunity to be explored
*   Group led meditative sequence using Kundalini Cobra Breath
*   Cuddle Puddle with sound bath
*   Group open free time for kiss & cuddles experience
*   Closing circle and shares

**What to bring?**

*   Comfy clothing, large towel/blanket, plushies/pillow, any other items to enhance your personal experience
*   Open, curious minds

**Workshop Tickets:** Early Bird $30, Regular $40

**NOTE:** We encourage everyone to have an open mind as this is a fun, open and explorative learning environment. We practice and review informed & ongoing consent practices with an emphasis on mutual opt in desire. This workshop is open to all gender identifications, sexual orientations, lifestyles, and we do not pair anyone as we honor genuine connections that arise in the evening.

This event is perfect and open for all experience levels.18+ for workshops. Refunds must be requested 7 days prior to the event. Doors open at 7pm and closes at 7:15 pm please be on time.

Follow us on Instagram –[instagram.com/nightowlsig](http://instagram.com/nightowlsig) – or visit our website – [nightowlsmeet.com](http://nightowlsmeet.com/) – to request a free membership and learn about all of our play parties, workshops, and socials!

—

**Frequently Asked Questions**

✨ When / how do I pay? Upon RSVP, guests will receive a secure payment form sent via the email address and phone number provided. This payment form must be completed within 24 hours of receiving it. Any guests who do not complete their payment form within 24 hours of receiving it will have their RSVP voided with no option for re-entry.

✨ I can no longer attend. Can I get a refund? Tickets are strictly non-refundable and non-transferable.

✨ I’m not a member, can I buy a ticket? For this event, yes. Only Night Owls events with open playspaces are solely available to registered members. This is to ensure that all guests attending an open play event have agreed to The Night Owls Code of Conduct providing a respectful and safe environment for everyone. The Night Owls Code of Conduct can be found here:

[https://docs.google.com/document/d/1fv4E5391miMXOc4djfV2sFwROAZ01vfMzPG3Qnm7uIw/edit?usp=drive\_link](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1fv4E5391miMXOc4djfV2sFwROAZ01vfMzPG3Qnm7uIw/edit?usp=drive_link)

For members-only events, you will need to supply the email address associated with your membership as part of the ticket-buying process.

You can apply for free membership here:

[https://form.jotform.com/Night\_Owls/join](https://form.jotform.com/Night_Owls/join)

Please note that each guest MUST be a vetted member with their own membership email. Please do not buy a ticket for a 'guest' as their ticket will be invalid and voided.

✨ When can I know the address of the venue? The address of the venue will be sent to approved and confirmed guests via the email address and phone number provided in the membership application.

✨ What do I need to bring to get in? Entry is only possible with your payment confirmation email and photo ID. This will be cross-checked with our membership list. If there isn't a photographic match, there will be no entry. Entry is always at the management’s discretion.

✨ Can I bring my own drinks? Yes, you may as the venue does not have an alcohol license. We will provide cups, ice and some soft drinks.

✨ Do I have to dress up? In short, yes. Night Owls parties have a strict dress code that must be adhered to. The venue has a free coat check room. You are welcome to come in regular clothes and change at the venue. Guests who do not adhere to the dress code will be refused entry with no refund.

Learn more about our events and free membership here: [http://nightowlsmeet.com/](http://nightowlsmeet.com/)

name: HMU Academy: Making Scenes More Verbal
description:
Whether words are your only tool or just a sprinkle to your scene, you don't need to be a tongue twisting wordsmith to master mental domming

Whether you feel like you're a words smith or a horrendous public speaker - this class is for you! Lola Jean has a gift of gab, but she designed this class for even the timidest of speakers.

Whether words are your only tool or just a little sprinkle to your scene, you don't need to be a tongue twisting wordsmith to master mental domination. Verbal domination pulls from many of the same tactics as physical, only your words are the tools. Learn how to trap someone in their own mind and use their thoughts against them. When we play with mind the only bounds are that of our imagination. We can play in fantasy as much as we play in reality.

We will run the gamut from sweet to sadistic. In this class you will learn how to incorporate more verbal elements pre, during, and post-scene. Learn how to use someones words to inspire and further the scene, how to create a world that isn't there and how to find, expose and RELEASE an insecurity.

In addition to these overall concepts, you will walk away with several tactics and tools build to confuse, gain intel, and direct particular attention to the words you are saying. Lola Jean pulls well beyond typical domination approaches by weaving in learnings from the hypnosis, thespian, and journalism communities.

pen and paper for notetaking if you feel so inclined

whatever your heart desires

for anyone - beginner or pro

solo or partnered!

**About Your Instructor**

Lola Jean is a Sex Educator, Fetish Wrestler, headmistress of 7 Days of Domination, and World Record Holder for Volume Squirting (solo.) providing the No Frills Sex Education we both need and deserve. name: 4 Elements - The Technique of Sensual Rope Bondage  by Tati Limati
description:
Imagine yourself in a shibari laboratory—a place dedicated to the exploration of techniques, feelings, sensations, silence, dance, energy, animal instincts, meditation, philosophy, aesthetics, intensity, and discipline... all through the medium of rope. 

In this space, you study a variety of techniques designed to open you up and bring more meaning to the dynamics of being gentle or tough. You learn to be mindful of breathing and emotional states, especially your own. The goal is to be as sincere and free as possible in the expression of shibari.

The four elements of shibari—"Air," "Earth," "Fire," and "Water"—are not merely a classification within a body-oriented approach; they also serve as a philosophical foundation that can unlock even greater potential and value within you, inspiring a deeper connection with others. This foundation, built upon years of experience, is presented in a pragmatic form accessible to everyone.

In this introductory workshop we will touch in some of the main techniques that characterize this approach, such as:

*   Theory of history and philosophy: "4 Elements" with demonstrations of each practice included in Shibari (Aikido, Thai massage, Contact Improv, Qigong, Tantra, BDSM)
*   Body mechanics of movement and points of influence on the body
*   Practice of four behavioral techniques for easier improvisation with ropes
*   "Ichi Nawa": Working with one rope to create a sensual connection with a partner
*   Different options for predicament ties
*   Exploring the senses in sensual tying
*   How to create a story with ropes
*   Developing empathy
*   Sensual "4 Elements" Gote Shibari and the art of touching your partner's heart

**Prerequisites**:

\-       Single column tie

\-       Wrapping, tension and reverse tension

\-       Have an understanding of basic frictions: half hitch, nodome, yuki fix

\-   Gote (Tekate Kote) shibari ( some understanding, can be  rudimentary)

Suitable for Beginner-Intermediate and Advanced levels

#### Materials:

You need 4 ropes 7-8 meters long.

Bring comfortable clothing.

If you like to take notes during class, please bring pen and paper.

This workshop is ideally followed as a couple, but it is also possible to self-tie.

Switching is allowed.

**You should know these shibari basics:**

\-       Single column tie

\-       Wrapping, tension and reverse tension

\-       Have an understanding of basic frictions: half hitch, nodome, yuki fix

\-   Gote (Tekate Kote) shibari

#### **About Tati Limati**

Tati is a Ukrainian shibari artist and instructor.

She studied in Europe and Japan. Among others, her teachers were Naka Akira, Ren Yagami, Kinoko Hajime, Nicolas Yoroi. She also studied the Yukimura style. She has a background in aikido, tango, contact improvisation, femdom, tantra and other practices. She is currently studying to obtain a third higher education degree in psychology.

Tati is the organizer of international events in Ukraine and Poland and a regular contributor to Shibari Theatre in Asia and around the world. Tati is also a traveler. She currently lives in Thailand.

Over the course of 12 years, Tati Limati has not just been training her rope skills, but researched many techniques and practices to integrate in her shibari practice. She combines elements of martial arts, contact improvisation, tantra, qi gong and Thai massage with the purpose of adding depth and sincerity to her own shibari work.

 In her teachings, she intends to help participants explore their underlying motivations and add deeper layers to their shibari play. With her techniques she aims to develop an understanding and the use of improvisation, making her students actively establish their own identities in rope play, instead of copying others without questioning.

name: The Feels Queer edition 3: an event for LGBTQIA+ love seekers in BK
description:
An conscious dating event for all in search of deeper connection

**// about \\\\**

The Feels mixes time to meet and connect casually, with a 90 min facilitated portion. the format was built in partnership with Columbia University; it blends positive psychology, mindfulness, non violent communication + somatic awareness practices.

We believe that when you feel grounded + good in your body, an openness is available - and that space is ideal for connecting to others. We'll guide you to that place.

Data shows that 70% of all attendees walk out with the contact info for someone they're excited about + that 'the feels' is 2x more effective than a typical singles event.

**// the who \\\\**

this edition of the feels is for those who are ISO queer connection. It's open to all sexual orientations and gender identities within in the LGBTQIA+ community.

**// pls note \\\\**

**We do not offer refunds, as we're a small business and unable to accommodate refund or credit requests for future events.**

However, you’re welcome to transfer your ticket to the same event in the same category. For example, if you purchased a ticket for Queer 3, you can transfer or sell it to another person for that same event. You are responsible for finding a replacement. Once the switch is confirmed, please email us their name and email.

While we typically don't offer credits for future events, we’re more flexible with our Queer and ENM events as we continue to grow those communities.

**For further questions on ticket transfers please refer to our** [**FAQ page**](https://catchthefeels.co/faqs/)**.**

**// ticket price accomodation \\\\**

If you have a desire to attend but your financial resources are limited, please email us at support@catchthefeels.co and we’ll do our best to accommodate.

name: Bedroom Badass Kinky Class and Practice: Beginner Rope 2 (part 1 not required to attend)
description:
House of Scorpio

presents

Bedroom Badass class & practice 

Topic: Beginner Rope 2 (part 1 not required to attend)

Wed 10.23, 7-11pm, 21+ (25+ suggested), HoS members only\*\*

Main space: class followed by guided practice, $0-30 depending on membership level

Bar & lounge: HoS Clubhouse, $FREE\*\*\*

Gemini & Scorpio Loft, 267 Douglass St, 3rd fl (ADA accessible)

Official info: http://www.houseofscorpio.com/events.html

Memberships & tix: http://www.houseofscorpio.com/membership.html (log in to buy tix)

FB: https://www.facebook.com/events/2290053288009826

FL: https://fetlife.com/events/1610693

PL: https://plra.io/m/bedroom-badass-kinky-class-and-practice-rope-par

Socials: @gemini\_scorpio #houseofscorpio

Although rope seems like the obvious choice of bondage material to many, it is a very difficult medium for beginners to manipulate properly. We will make it easy for you by introducing basic safety and tool concepts before moving onto basic rope restraint techniques. These rope ties can be used decoratively and restrictively in a variety of positions, which can be customized to meet yours and your partners' physical abilities and personal goals.

Some topics to be covered:

\- Why rope?

\- Safety basics

\- Rope tension

\- Scene experience options

Demos & practice:

\- Connected tying demo/exercise

\- Beginner friendly Wrist & Ankle Cuffs with Options

\- Basic Chest Harness with Flexibility Options

\- Simple Full Body Harness

All BB classes are a mixture of lecture, hands-on experience, and dedicated Q&A time. After class, stay for dedicated practice & play time to help you solidify your skills, while our teacher remains available for guidance. Class and practice are in the main space, while the bar lounge is open 7pm-12am if you want to arrive early or leave late -- or just need a break. Always BYO practice items, where relevant, though we will always have a selection on hand.

Our teacher: Multithreaded/Mike (He/Him) Is a long time rope enthusiast with 10+ years of experience in the NYC Rope/Kink community. He enjoys exploring the power and versatility of rope as a creative act of communication, connection, and shared experience through an improvisational and observant style. He also enjoys sharing knowledge and helping others along their rope journey. 

Bedroom Badass is our series of workshops to take couples and individuals through various steps in opening up their relationships, or in exploring more adventurous sexual experiences. Whether you're a total novice or an old pro, each class has a range of information relevant to all experience levels.

\*Bedroom Badass happens on the second and fourth Wednesday of each month

\*\*HoS rules: HoS membership required; dress code, PAL or prior approval not required; Code of Conduct always applies; no photos except in the designated front area.

\*\*\*Plus: House of Scorpio Clubhouse.

Whatever your membership level, you are invited to use our space as your own for the night...as your clubhouse. While the ticketed activities will take place on the stage side of the room, the bar and lounge will remain open 7pm-11pm (12am if enough people are lounging). Just like with regular events, if you're Friend level and above, you can bring up to two friends with you. Order in dinner, have a few drinks, run a friendly board game, or just read a book on the comfy couch. This is not a mixer -- just us opening our doors for our members. It's up to you how much you socialize, if at all, and with whom.

COVID safety: HoS requires proof of vaccination on file; masks encouraged; two hospital grade UV air purifiers cycle the air.

description:
About
-----

Drawing comparisons to Björk and Sinead O'Connor, Shrines is the moniker of Brooklyn-based singer and musician Carrie Erving (Ponyhof, Will Butler). Skillfully weaving influences of pop, electronic music, indie rock, and Irish sean-nós (traditional ‘old style’ Irish singing) into her music, Shrines delivers shimmering art-pop that the New York Times described as ‘spellbinding.’ Shrines’ latest EP, Seasons, produced by Rosana Cabán (Psychic Twin, Cosas Cosas), will be released on Oct 18th, 2024.

name: Pallet Wrap Bondage, Mummification, & Suspension
description:
Yet another form of fun taught by our favorite duo — Bruce & Shermie! ♡

Yet another form of fun taught by Taillor's favorite duo — Bruce & Shermie! ♡ Learn how to use pallet wrap to suspend someone above the ground, safely and beautifully during this special 3 hour class. Covering pallet wrap mummification, bondage, and suspension.

**About the Hosts**

With many decades of scene experience, [Shermie](https://twitter.com/Shermie_3) & [Bruce](https://twitter.com/ParkingQueens) are the _“Statler & Waldorff”_ of the Kink community. Bruce is a Master Builder and Curator of large BDSM equipment with a unique ability to teach from the bottom. Shermie is a retired Physician and Educator who bottoms and service-tops with both fire and medical play.

**#TaillorCollective #ToEitherPleaseOrEducat**e

**Who are we?**

The Taillor Group is a collective of fierce femme-identifying Dommes headquartered in our beautiful residential dungeon in Bushwick. We are dedicated to the BDSM lifestyle and community, and offer a range of ways to be involved.

**What is this event?**

Our workshops are social, group gatherings that bring members of the BDSM community together in a playful and educational setting. Workshops generally run one hour long are intended to be spaces of learning, and practicing techniques honed in the class. Workshops are not open play-time (unless specifically stated otherwise).

**Where is The Crown located?**

In Prospect Lefferts Gardens, Brooklyn. Walking distance from the train. Exact address on confirmation page, and ticket after purchasing.

**DOOR TIMES:**

Doors for the event will open precisely 5 minutes before starting time and close precisely at 10 minutes after. Please arrive on time for all events.

**TICKETS:**

Participating Sub Ticket: to participate and be used. We welcome participating subs of all genders.

General Admission Ticket: only to watch.

Participating Domme Ticket: For outside dommes, or dominant femme identifying folk who wish to try out what they learn in class.

Single submissive attendees are especially encouraged to attend, as we use workshops to hone our techniques and better our craft as Dommes. We know you need us... desperately. But, we need you!

**Dress Code:**

CDUS (Clothed Dominant, Unclothed Submissive) encouraged. Cross-Dressing and fetishwear appreciated.

**GOOD TO KNOW:**

This event is 21+- The Taillor Collective plays SSC (safe, sane, and consensual).

The Crown is a space for everyone to feel safe and welcomed. We have a zero-tolerance policy towards any kind of hate within our space. Ableism, racism, fatphobia, transphobia, homophobia, misogyny, and/or misogynoir will result in immediate expulsion.

**STILL HAVE QUESTIONS?**

Call or text us at +1 (347) 855 4877, or send an email to events@taillors.com

**NO REFUNDS**

name: POWER PLAY: Resistance & Brat Taming
description:
### Workshop: POWER PLAY | Resistance & Brats

**Hosted by Nix (the Sirenatrix)**

> This transformative edu-series on Power - designed for Dom(mes), subs, and switches - who wish to gain a deeper understanding of influence and surrender. Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned veteran, this workshop will enhance your skills and scenes - and perhaps even your perspective.

> This series of workshops will likely change the way you view power exchange, giving you a new appreciation for the intimacy involved in influence. Raising your voice in a domineering way isn’t the same as influencing your sub with a single whisper—true power tends to be subtle, grounded, intentional, and deeply connected. In **POWER PLAY**, you’ll learn how to get someone’s entire mind, body, and soul on board with your desires. You’ll learn to play with resistance, use your physicality, and make your presence felt down to the core. Every session will delve into a different facet of power dynamics. Embrace your role, refine your tools, and discover the depths of power exchange in a supportive educational environment.

Resistance & Brat Taming
------------------------

*   **The Dance of Resistance**: Understand the dynamics of resistance and how to use it to heighten the tension and excitement in your scenes.
*   **Taming the Brat**: Learn the art of brat taming, how to enjoy playful resistance, and transform it into a powerful exchange of energy.
*   **Power Struggles**: When you feel a “Clash” between you and your counterpart, learn how to move the energy.

((Come to all four workshops or drop in for just one! ))

—-------------------------------------------------------------------------

#### Workshop Format:

*   **Discussion and Practical Exercises**: The workshop will include a mix of discussions and hands-on exercises. You'll have the chance to interact with others, practice communication techniques, and receive feedback. 
*   **Solo and Group Work**: You can come alone or with a partner. During the exercises, you'll have the opportunity to switch partners, which allows for practicing with familiar partners and new acquaintances. This helps simulate both established dynamics and pickup play scenarios. 
*   **Dress Code and Interactions**: Feel free to dress however you want, whether vanilla or ready to play. Expect to interact with others for the exercises, at least in terms of communication and light D/s. More physical play will be saved for the jam afterwards. We do not pair people up, and encourage guests to make friends and engage to their level of comfort ensuring that all are able to learn and grow. Couples can stay paired the whole time or practice with others if you so choose.
*   This workshop is open to all genders, sexual orientations, lifestyles, singles, and couples. All experience levels welcome. 18+.
*   Refunds must be requested 7 days prior to the event. 
*   Doors open at 7:30pm and close at 7:40 pm. Please be on time and text ahead if you are delayed. 
*   You are welcome to wear a mask throughout the duration of the event.

#### JAM After the Workshop:

Stick around for our jam session, exclusively open to workshop participants. During the jam, you'll have the opportunity to practice your new skills on dungeon furniture in a safe and supportive environment. Nix & Rrrob will be available to offer feedback or conduct activities that cement workshop learning. This is a unique chance to develop muscle memory through hands-on experience, working and learning together in a playful setting.

#### Workshop 7:30-9:30 pm - Jam 9:45pm-11:45pm

#### _Near Herald Square / Address given in confirmation email additional info / Elevator Access available at this location_

#### Pricing:

● **Workshop**: Early Bird $30, Classic $40

● **Workshop and Jam**: Early $55, Classic $75

SAVE WHEN YOU GO TO ALL FOUR: Workshops $140 or Workshop + Jams $260

name: Welcome to Dykea: A HypeDykes Comedy Show Halloween Edition!
description:
Event description
-----------------

**ABOUT**

Come enjoy a stand-up comedy show celebrating the best in queer comedy! A lineup made of some of our favorite comedians who you'll love so much you'll want to adopt a dog and move upstate with them! Featuring Olivia Von Blue, Kendall Davis, Chiara Montali & Sophia Pelton! 

**ARRIVAL**

The show begins at 7:30 so we suggest you come before then to secure your spot and get a refreshment from one of the lovely bartenders.  

**COVID PROTOCOLS**

As showrunners one of our biggest missions is to create a safe space for all to enjoy. This is why we take additional measures to make our shows an event even our friends with autoimmune and other conditions can feel okay in! We encourage you to wear a mask, especially while the performers are on stage, but this is a safe space in every sense of the word so we respect what makes you feel comfortable as well.

name: Asstrology — a queer play party by the Taillors
location: Exact address will be sent to you via email. , Brooklyn, NY 11225
description:
Queer play never felt so good

**About this event:**

A kinky play party for the LGBTQIA2S+ community hosted by the Taillors femdoms and dommxs. This party is centering femme, enby, agender, gnc, genderqueer, genderf\*cker, ace, two-spirit, intersex, and trans queers.

This is a 21+ event.

**What is this event?**

We are a group of domme/xs, many of whom identify as queer, and we want to open up our dungeon space monthly to our LGBTQIA2S+ community to create a safe space to practice kink for us, by us. Come play saucy games, get to know other hotties, or even dare to approach one of our domme/xs for a mini-session!

**Rough Schedule:**

7:00pm: Introduction Circle and Consent Agreement (Safety rules!)

7:15pm: Ice-breaker Game (Some of our favorites include human furniture musical chairs, “Who’s Spanking Me,” and Strap-On Swordfight - so bring those paddles and straps!)

7:30-10pm: Free Play/Mingling!

**\*BYOB**. Bring some beverages or snacks to share! There is a fridge to keep your libations cool. Cups provided. FYI: While this is not a sober space, obvious intoxication will not be tolerated in play.

**\*Cis men** - you are not the focus of this party. We love you, we see you, but we are seeking to decenter you within this particular space, on this particular night. If you must be present, you must be a guest of one of our non-cis male guests, you must purchase our “Guest Pass,” and you must enter and exit with the person of whom you are a guest, and said person is also responsible for you and your behavior during your time within our space. Thank you for understanding and we will see you at our next party!

**\*Non-LGBTQIA2S+ (hetero) allies** - we are aiming to keep this party a queer space and we ask that you please come out to one of our other parties instead. We love you and appreciate your support, but the best way to support this event is to please allow us to cultivate a queer-only space this time. See you at our next party!

**Rules:**

The Crown is a space for everyone to feel safe, welcome, and uplifted.

We have a zero-tolerance policy towards any kind of hate within our space. Ableism, racism, fatphobia, transphobia, homophobia, misogyny, and/or misogynoir will result in immediate expulsion. If you see this occurring or you are being bullied or harassed, please immediately report this to any of our Taillor’s domme/xs present and we will take care of the matter.

Consent is mandatory for all activities. Please always ASK FIRST prior to touching, photographing, filming, or engaging in any type of play with another person or people, and please maintain ongoing enthusiastic consent during play. If someone is making you uncomfortable, violating your boundaries, or harassing you, please immediately report this to any of our Taillor’s domme/xs present and we will help you.

Stay safe and have fun!

\* If pricing of this party is a barrier to you, please reach out to us via text at 347-855-4877 for a discount code. Please do not take advantage - we have a limited number of these and would like to reserve them only for those who need them.

**#TaillorCollective #ToEitherPleaseOrEducate**

**Who are we?**

The Taillor Group is a collective of fierce femme-identifying Dommes headquartered in our beautiful residential dungeon in Bushwick. We are dedicated to the BDSM lifestyle and community, and offer a range of ways to be involved.

**Where is The Crown located?**

In Prospect Lefferts Garden, Brooklyn. Walking distance from the train. Exact address on confirmation page, and ticket after purchasing.

**DOOR TIMES:**

Doors for the event will open precisely 5 minutes before starting time.

**TICKETS:**

Queer G eneral Admission: This ticket is for open-play (general admission) for those who identify as queer and are not cis-men.

G uest Ticket: No straight people. Cis men must purchase the guest ticket and must be a guest of a non-cis male Queer General Admission (GA) ticket holder. Cis men must arrive and exit the party with their queer non-cis male friend who is the Queer GA ticket holder. Limit of one guest ticket per Queer GA ticket holder.

**Dress Code:**

As much or as little coverage as you feel called to wear. Gender bending, fetishwear and expressiveness are encouraged. You may change your outfit on site.

**GOOD TO KNOW:**

This event is 21+. The Taillor Collective plays SSC (safe, sane, and consensual).

The Crown is a space for everyone to feel safe and welcomed. We have a zero-tolerance policy towards any kind of hate within our space. Ableism, racism, fatphobia, transphobia, homophobia, misogyny, and/or misogynoir will result in immediate expulsion.

**STILL HAVE QUESTIONS?**

Call or text us at +1 (347) 855 4877, or send an email to events@taillors.com

**NO REFUNDS**

name: Shanghai Vice Jazz
description:
Shanghai in the 1920s and 30s tantalized the British, American, French and Chinese alike with its lawless streets and dens of sumptuous iniquity. Known as "the wickedest city in the world," artists, politicians, entrepreneurs, diplomats and the dispossessed roamed its winding streets, chasing thrills at every turn.

Strains of jazz mingled with Hollywood film music and Chinese folk melodies in the night air, while this heady sonic melange drew the ire of burgeoning leftist and Nationalist movements, who denounced these hypnotic new sounds as "opium for the masses." The so-called "Paris of Asia" even surpassed its European counterpart with the sheer volume of drugs, sex, sights and sounds offered to bold adventurers from far and wide.

Join us for a night of music extolling the danger, mystery and romance of this iconic era, featuring The Red Pavilion Jazz Band and aerial artistry from the Subtle Asian Polers.

_Walk-ins welcome any time during the show. Doors 8:45pm, show 9:15pm_. _All events are 21+, and a valid physical ID is required for entry. Please be reminded that tables have a 2-drink minimum on Fridays and Saturdays, 1-drink minimum all other days. All sales are final._

City of Gods comes alive every Halloween to bring you a divine music & arts festival spanning 2 breathtaking nights.

_Eros • Magic •Tantra • Ceremony_

**As we enter spooky season and the veil thins, Queen Persephone and her King Consort Hades invite you into their underworld realm…**

You may have heard the story of Persephone and Hades as told through the patriarchal lens of ancient Greece, however when we dig deeper into the oldest myths we find a kinky story of consensual dominance and submission, a tale of deep devotional love between a Queen and her King.

Join us on this journey into the underworld! In this unique ceremonial experience you will be invited to challenge yourself to confront your shadows and meet them in erotic dance as we transmute them.

We will be combining meditation, shadow work integration techniques, Tantra and Existential Kink to work with our shadows to heal blocks that keep us from experiencing our divine birthright of ecstatic pleasure.

Decolonize ancient myths and your own soul while experiencing sensuous ceremonial elixirs, temple sacrament, dance, sound and performances that will inspire and empower you to meet yourself with a love so devotional to the truth of who you are; you will never be the same again.

**About our Amazing Hosts:**

[Pagan’s Paradise](https://pagansparadise.com) & [Soverign Love](https://www.SovereignLove.nyc/link-in-bio) are leading curators of erotic Temple experiences and very excited to bring you their top facilitators for this very special evening of conscious debauchery!

She works with her clients to clear trauma through plant medicines, meditation and somatic practices. Over the last decade Vanessa has re-indigenized into her Mexica & Toltec lineages and is trained in Mexica (Aztec) Astrological Cosmology.

Her mission is for humanity to remember their original divinity and to awaken and activate their gifts through Channeled Readings, Reiki, Kundalini Yoga, Breathe Work, Intuitive Body work, Light Language Activations, and Intuitive Ritual Body Art. Fairy Hawk will be offering a sound bath eros activation

**Activities/Scenes include:**

**What to bring:**

• Open, curious minds and the intention to connect with your authentic sensual expression.

**Dress Code:**

We encourage everyone to dress in theme either as a creature of the underworld or a radiant being of love and light.

Other options being sacred/kink gear, fet wear, leather, latex, indigenous, ceremonial, sexy attire, cocktail lounge wear and optional.

**Do not wear** street clothing, workout attire, jeans or casual wear, remember this is a party dress to impress in either sexy or fun ways. (You can be turned away at the door if you do not put in effort)

Paired Admit 2 People Tickets:

(sharing is caring, so bring a Lover or Friend!)

_There are NO REFUNDS for this event - if you cannot make it, please gift or sell your ticket to a worthy soul._

Doors will **open at 8pm** for open socializing and **close promptly at 9:30pm** for Opening Circle, Cacao Ceremony and consent talk. From then on, it shall remain a closed, safe container.

This event is perfect for all experience levels and we encourage you to play consensually to your level of comfort and risk profile.

name: City Of Gods Halloween 2024 - Saturday
description:
**Description**

City of Gods comes alive every Halloween to bring you a divine music & arts festival spanning 2 breathtaking nights. 

A city of endless potential. A city of love and dust. A city of revelry and renaissance.

Express your extravagance at a gathering of immense opulence.

Indulge in the rapture of dance.

Come play in a multi-room labyrinth of stages, shrines, and sanctuaries for your play and pleasure, designed for expansive celebrations.

We welcome all deities, demigods and demons, goddexxes, creatures of creation and those devoted to hedonism beyond the human realm.

City of Gods features a curated selection of sound camps and collectives from That Place In The Desert known as Black Rock City. We are honored to bring together our favorite experience creators who have given us our most empowering divine memories.

This is your city. We are your worshippers.

Single day tickets + 2-day passes are available

F﻿or all info, tickets, and FAQ: [cityofgods.nyc](https://www.cityofgods.nyc/)

✧ **CAMPS (alphabetical order)** ✧

DISTRIKT

GlamCocks

Kostume Kult

Mayan Warrior

Miki Beach

Mystopia

Pink Mammoth

PlayAlchemist

Tierra Bomba

Titanic's End

✧ **EXPERIENCES** ✧

The Tower (NEW!) · Chapel of Sacred Mirrors (CoSM) · Shrines of Seduction · Psychedelic Sanctuaries · Dungeons of Deviance · Elixirs of Bliss · Art Bazaar · Performance Rites & Rituals · Open-Air Carnival of Curiosities · Delicious Decadent Bites · Photo Booths · Healing Gardens · Chillout Lounges · Speakeasy Cabaret · and so much more to be discovered..

✧ **THE MUSIC** ✧

True to our City’s tradition, we do not release the music lineup for this event. We invite you to embrace the spirit of the playa and welcome new musical discoveries. Our selection of selectors is secret. 

✧ **COSTUMES REQUIRED** ✧

Radical Expressions and Radiant Adornments are required for access to this City. Express your excellence. Become your fantasy. Create, don’t appropriate. Get inspired here: [http://pin.it/g8J-qPp](http://pin.it/g8J-qPp)

✧ **GENERAL ADMISSIONS TICKETS** ✧

Tickets are available as Single Night (Friday or Saturday) or 2-Day Passes. The camps, music lineups, and immersive performances change from night to night. The experiences you will have are directly linked to how deeply you explore. 2-Day Festival Passes are available to satiate your curiosities.

✧ **PREMIUM BACKSTAGE TICKET** ✧

Premium tickets come with Backstage access, a dedicated VIP entry, dedicated VIP bathrooms, a private Divinity Lounge to unwind, complimentary bites, and an open champagne bar all night.

✧ **TABLES & BOTTLE SERVICE** ✧

Please reach out to reservations@cityofgods.nyc to discuss table reservations & packages.

✧ **HOTEL PACKAGES** ✧

We offer preferred pricing on hotel accommodations booked via our Crewfare site. Find out more at [https://crewfare.com/events/city-of-gods-halloween/](https://crewfare.com/events/city-of-gods-halloween/)  

✧ **INFO & FAQ** ✧ 

21+ with valid ID. No Re-Entry. All Sales Are Final

[www.cityofgods.nyc/faq](http://www.cityofgods.nyc/faq)

Amanda is a Certified Cuddle Party Facilitator and is honored to host these events for our growing community of Cuddle Monsters! Come out and try this unique oxytocin bliss-filled experience and let your stresses melt away.

In our cozy, safe space, we will start with icebreakers and the rules of cuddling for the evening. You will gain practice in setting boundaries, expressing your NO and delivering it with compassion. Simultaneously, you will be encouraged to navigate our space with fearlessness and fun to ultimately discover your HEAVENS YES!

These are skills that can be taken back into your personal life and can drastically improve ALL of your relationships!

You will walk away with newfound confidence and unforgettable memories!

**The Experience:** This is an in-person workshop in a beautiful and private studio space in Manhattan. The workshop will include 3 hours of discussion & instruction where you will be able to receive and explore new techniques and positions.

**Intended Outcomes:** Think hugs, back rubs, foot rubs, nuzzling, head scratching, spooning and all forms of non-sexual snuggling!

*   Connection
*   Friendship
*   Community
*   Personal Development
*   Giving and Receiving Affection
*   Healing Touch
*   Laughter

**What to bring?**

*   Comfy Pajamas
*   Healthy Snacks to Share
*   Water Bottles
*   Blanket, Pillow or Plushies!

**Cost:**

*   Early Bird $30
*   Regular $40
*   At door $60

Doors open at 1pm, Welcome circle at 1:15 and the doors will be closed at that time, please be sure to come within that time frame.

NOTE: We encourage everyone to have an open mind as this is a fun, open and explorative learning environment. We practice and review informed & ongoing consent practices with an emphasis on mutual desire. This workshop is open to all gender identifications, sexuaI orientations and lifestyles. This is an alcohol and drug-free space and nonsexual environment.

This event is perfect and open for all experience levels. 18+ for workshops. Refunds must be requested 7 days prior to the event.

**About Your Facilitator:**

Amanda Ananda is an International Tantric Facilitator and Domestic Goddess of 2 outrageous young boys. Amanda has a diverse Tantrica background that allows for a unique, blissful and radiant experience to unfold in her workshops, online courses and sessions. Her techniques will help you to become embodied with simple-yet-profound, heartfelt tools that you can apply in your daily life.

You can listen to Amanda talk about Cuddle Party in an interview with Chion Wolf on CT Public Radio here:

[https://www.ctpublic.org/show/audacious-with-chion-wolf/2022-06-02/we-have-to-talk-about-cuddle-parties](https://www.ctpublic.org/show/audacious-with-chion-wolf/2022-06-02/we-have-to-talk-about-cuddle-parties)

name: HMU Academy: Strength & ConditiK!NK
description:
Join fitness coaches Alex & Lucca for an open-level strength & conditioning class with a k!nky twist. Ticket bundles available!

_This is a public event. HMU’s public events are 18+. Our vetted & private lists are 21+ only._

Do your arms get tired from flogging someone over and over?

Have trouble hoisting your favorite rope bunny?

Do your legs burn from squatting too much?

Just can’t wield that paddle all night long like you used to?

**Join coaches Alex & Lucca for an open-level strength & conditioning class with a kinky twist. Ticket bundles available for Sept 30 + Oct 28 + Nov 25 (last Monday of the month)!**

Doors Open: 6:30pm

Class Time: 7:00-8:00pm

Mingle: 8:00-8:45pm

This class is for everybody and every body! Modifications will be offered for each movement depending on your level of experience (with both fitness & with kink). Movements for this class will be kink-functional with a focus on enhancing endurance for impact related play. Please note, while there will be impact related movements, there will be no play during this class. We can't wait to see you there!

**Equipment to Bring:** This class will incorporate movements using kink implements including but not limited to floggers, paddles, whips, canes, etc. Bringing your own is highly encouraged, however there will be a limited number of items to borrow for class. Yoga mat for floor work, and a towel for sweat is suggested but not required. Water bottles are encouraged so you can have your water close by, water will be provided.

**About the instructors:**

**Alex (they/them):** Alex is a lifelong kinkster and joined the Hit Me Up community in 2022. As a nontraditional athlete living in a fat, QTPOC body, they strongly believe in the power of embodied movement and kink! Alex trains and coaches from a HAES (Health At Every Size) framework, and is committed to creating accessible, affirming spaces for their clients to reach their strength, movement and training goals. Alex is a Certified NASM and TI-PT (Trauma Informed) Personal Trainer.

**Lucca (they/them)**: Lucca has been a member of the Hit Me Up community since 2022 (you may know them as EJ). They have coached and competed in a wide variety of sports over the last 15 years including Long Distance Running, CrossFit, Olympic Weightlifting, and Roller Derby. Lucca has experience coaching all levels, and through this class they hope to bring their passions for kink and fitness together to help others achieve their goals in the streets as well as the sheets ;)

**Dress code:** Please wear clothing that you can comfortably move and sweat in. Feel free to dress in a way that makes you feel sexy (and strong)! Booty shorts, bodysuits, lingerie, and kink-wear more than welcome. Be sure whatever you're wearing doesn't restrict your movement. Topplessness is okay but there is **no full nudity!** Lower-half bits must remain covered. Close-toed shoes are required, sneakers or training shoes are strongly encouraged.

**Time:** Class will be an hour long and will begin at 7pm. We will have some time after class to cool down and mingle. Check out our upcoming [event schedule here](https://www.eventbrite.com/o/hit-me-up-69189357793) for more dates.

**Level:** This class is an open level class, we will be offering more accessible modifications and add-on options for difficulty with some exercises. Please listen to your body. Take rest and water breaks as needed! This is a judgment-free zone.

**Injuries:** Recent injuries should be cleared by your doctor/PT before attending class. Please let Coaches Alex & Lucca know about any recent or major injuries before class begins so we can go over any accommodations needed. If you have any questions about your injury feel free to reach out to us: [fatkidathleticsnyc@gmail.com](mailto:fatkidathleticsnyc@gmail.com) & [luccafinley@gmail.com](mailto:luccafinley@gmail.com)

**Pregnancy:** All pregnant and post natal clients should be cleared by their doctor, and must speak to Coaches before class to discuss any accommodations needed.

**Consent:** The rules of consent apply to this class. Please read Hit Me Up's full consent policy [here.](https://www.hitmeupnyc.com/consent) We reserve the right to ask individuals to leave class if deemed necessary for violating this policy.

**Public Event:** This event is open to members of the public who dress and behave appropriately. If you have previously been a member and been specifically notified that your membership was discontinued, please do not attend. If you're unsure, you're welcome to check your status by emailing hello@hitmupnyc.com. (If you are interested in joining our private events, you can always submit an [application](https://hitmeupnyc.com/join)).

**Waiver:** All class participants must sign a general waiver when they arrive. Please review it here.

**Refunds:** No refunds on ticket bundles. Refunds for any reason available for single date purchases.

\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*

**STAY IN TOUCH!**

Instagram [@hitmeupnycity](http://www.hitmeupnyc.com/hitmeupnycity)

Join our [public newsletter](https://www.hitmeupnyc.com/newsletter)

✨Volunteers: Limited volunteer spots available. Please email [admin@hitmeupnyc.com](mailto:admin@hitmeupnyc.com) to express interest.

✨Location: Lower Manhattan. The space has an elevator. Please email [hello@hitmeupnyc.com](mailto:hello@hitmeupnyc.com) if you need any accessibility accommodations.

✨Full vaccination is required. While we recommend getting the booster shots, we are not verifying them at this time.

✨Consent Policy: All of our events are ASK FIRST events. The rules of respectful and consensual behavior WILL be enforced. You will be responsible for reading our consent policy and behaving appropriately. Read our consent policy in full: [https://www.hitmeupnyc.com/consent](https://www.hitmeupnyc.com/consent)

✨Membership: We reserve the right to refuse entry if needed. Hit Me Up also hosts private events which are invite only, and anyone new to Hit Me Up must apply and be approved to attend—no guests or plus ones. Please visit [https://www.hitmeupnyc.com/join](https://www.hitmeupnyc.com/join) to join. You are welcome to inquire as to your status or that of your friends, but please do not act as if you have an entitlement to access our space or members. Building special spaces is hard, and while we are inclusive and welcoming, we reserve the right to curate our membership as needed to maintain our flourishing community. **If you'd like to sponsor a new member please have them apply as soon as possible. If they wait until a few days before the event we cannot guarantee they will be able to be approved in time.**

✨Please stay home if you are feeling ill or if you have had recent close contact with someone who tested Covid positive (within the past 5 days). You could be incubating and still test negative. Any requests for refunds for any reason will be honored up to the day of the party. Remember: safe, sane, and sanitary Just email [hello@hitmeupnyc.com](mailto:hello@hitmeupnyc.com) [mailto:hello@hitmeupnyc.com](mailto:hello@hitmeupnyc.com) and we will give you a full refund, no questions asked.

name: Shamanic Bondage - Kundalini Rising & Rope Jam
description:
**Shamanic Bondage - Kundalini Rising & Rope Jam**

﻿**Workshop 7:30-9:45 pm - Jam 10pm-12am**

**_Address given in confirmation email additional info, this location has elevator access._**

Pagans Paradise Production Facilitated by [Snarfox](https://www.instagram.com/truxvulpe.wild.wellness)

Podcast on workshop Featured here [http://earthlydesire.com/ep58](http://earthlydesire.com/ep58) & [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/episode/3uFWweIfUk2QJOzOcHxCUb?si=1b1be5cb3b5c4f4f)

**_We are having a 2-part evening of indulgence and learning. Come for the workshop and stay for the Jam to practice what you learned and meet other like-minded folks!_**

**Are you ready to experience a divine merging of the er0tic and the spiritual?**

Step into the world of _Shamanic Bondage_, where the ancient practices of Shibari and Kundalini energy awaken your Eros and bring you into alignment with the divine.

Join us at Pagan's Paradise for an immersive and transformative journey where submission becomes sacred and energy rises from your root to your crown. **This is** a chance to explore the deeper realms of er0tic energy and self-awareness, to release old blockages, and to connect with your own divine essence.

**Event Highlights**

**Beginner's Rope Safety & Chaos Rope Ritual:** Learn basic knots and frictions in a way that focuses on grounding and divine submission, rather than restraint.

**Kundalini Activation & Chakra Alignment:** Awaken your Kundalini energy through breathwork and visualization, allowing your body’s energy to rise naturally and align with your highest self.

**Essential Oils & Plant Medicine:** Experience the transformative power of scent through anointing with sacred oils that anchor energy and enhance your journey.

**Soundscapes & Binaural Beats:** Guided by the soothing vibrations of low-frequency soundscapes, dive deep into the shamanic journey of self-discovery and energy awakening.

This session will leave you feeling grounded, empowered, and more deeply connected to both yourself and your partner. You’ll walk away with tools to continue this practice on your own and integrate its benefits into your daily life.

**The Experience**

**Preparation:** Upon arrival, you will enter a sacred space with low lighting, incense, and essential oils. We’ll start with an opening circle where each person can share their intentions for the evening.

**Breathwork & Kundalini Activation:** The first part of the evening will be dedicated to breathwork, guiding you through deep inhalations and exhalations to flex the perineum and channel energy from the base of your spine to the crown of your head. You'll feel the subtle rise of energy within your body.

**Rope Ritual:** You’ll then engage in a rope ritual that focuses on using basic knots and chaos rope techniques. The goal is to create a container for surrender and submission—not just to your partner but also to the divine energy that flows through you.

**Shamanic Journey & Visualization:** This will be the heart of the experience. Through guided visualization, you will enter a meditative trance state supported by the healing properties of binaural beats and essential oils. You will feel your Kundalini energy spiral through your chakras, aligning and awakening your energy system.

**Integration:** At the end of the session, you’ll have time to slowly reintegrate, untie, and reflect on your experience in a closing circle. This will be a time for sharing and grounding.

**Ongoing Benefits:** After the session, you will take home tools to continue this practice and stay connected to the energy that was raised. You’ll learn how to maintain the alignment of your chakras and keep your Kundalini energy activated.

**For the Adventurous Souls**

*   This is not just an experience—it's a call to the soul. Come prepared to explore both the light and the shadow of your own energy, your body, and your connection to the divine. Whether you're a seasoned rope bunny or new to Shamanic practices, this offering is open to all who are ready to embrace their inner power and let the Kundalini rise.

**Benefits for Participants:**

*   **Emotional and Psychological Healing:** Combining these practices helps release emotional blockages and fosters a deeper connection with oneself and others​
*   **Enhanced Connection:** Learn tools and techniques to strengthen bonds with partners, creating a deeper sense of intimacy and trust.
*   **Therapeutic Properties:** Discover the calming and healing effects of essential oils and how they can support mental and physical health.
*   **Spiritual Growth:** Experience a guided shamanic journey that opens pathways to spiritual insights and personal transformation.

#### **Workshop Format:**

● **Discussion and Practical Exercises**: The workshop includes a mix of theoretical discussion and hands-on practice, allowing you to learn and apply new skills in real-time.

● **Solo and Group Work**: You can come alone or with a partner. During the exercises, you'll have the chance to practice with different people to simulate various dynamics.

● **Dress Code**: Feel free to dress comfortably. You can wear anything from regular clothing to something more playful that suits your personal style.

#### **Jam After the Workshop:**

Stay for our jam session, exclusively open to workshop participants. During the jam, you'll have the opportunity to practice your new skills in a relaxed and supportive environment. This is a unique chance to cement these essential skills through hands-on experience, working and learning together in a playful setting.

#### **Pricing:**

● **Workshop**: Plura+ $30, Classic $40

● **Workshop and Jam**: Plura+ $55, Classic $75

#### **What to Bring:**

● Your favorite ropes and tying tools (if you have them)

● Open, curious minds

● We will have rope for sale, $20 each for 35 feet

**NOTE:** We encourage everyone to have an open mind as this is a fun, open and explorative learning environment. We practice and review informed & ongoing consent practices with an emphasis on mutual opt in desire. This workshop is open to all gender identifications, sexual orientations, lifestyles, and we do not pair anyone as we honor genuine connections that arise in the evening.

This event is perfect and open for all experience levels.18+ for workshops. Refunds must be requested 7 days prior to the event. Doors open at 7:30pm and closes at 7:40 pm please be on time.

Any questions or concerns email PagansParadiseNYC@gmail.com

name: Beginners Rope Lab
description:
Beginner Rope Lab is hosted by Masha and intended primarily, but not only, for people who have taken Rope 0 at Temple and desire supported practice time for foundational rope techniques.

The first hour will be spent on demos of basic techniques including single and double-column ties, collapsible and non-collapsible knots, counter-tensions, and lock-off techniques. name: Tantric Trance Dance
description:
**Tantric Trance Dance 7:30pm-9:30pm**

**_Address given in confirmation email additional info_**

**Facilitated by** [Goddess Shakti](https://www.libglobal.org/)

**Join us for an amazing evening of sacred spiritual energy!**

Embracing the Yoga of Sound and the essence of Hatha without doing typical asana poses that we have grown to believe in as an essential element of yoga.

Hatha (Ha-Tha, described as a “sun-Moon”)…. Nothing about poses.

Hatha is described as “sun-moon” to emphasize negative-positive, male-female, these two opposite forces in nature that we meditate upon to harness constructive forceful means to bring about change to our mental and emotional state.

This nourishing and playful practice encourages delicious trance, sensual body movement, and vocal Shakti invocation.

In this practice, we constructively and playfully rebel against convention. We approach yoga in an unconventional way with trance dance and using the power of our voice.

Relish the experience of playfully cutting straight through the noise and chaos of various unpredictable mental states and life and take a break from the stubborn sticky impulses of ego in a trance-supported ecstatic dance practice.

Through this technique we experience the blissful absorption of yoga’s final stages: dhyana, yoga's 7th limb, and then finally, potentially the final 8th stage-Samadhi.

This is a specific progression of movement modes that promote delightfully deep meditation.

There are no complex or challenging poses or dance moves to work out. You do not need to think, figure things out, or worry how you look.

You are in a totally supportive space that has been infused with unconditional love. We will engage in a tonal voice technique that will help us to tune the divine instruments that we are and harmonize ourselves with the unified field of consciousness as we slide into a deep and peaceful meditative and free state.

**The Workshop Experience:** This is an in-person workshop/gathering in a beautiful and private studio space in Manhattan (near Herald Square). The workshop will include 2.5 hours of mingling, getting to know your fellow humans, spiritual connections and movement.

**Desired Benefits:** You will gain new ways to connect and bond with yourself and your fellow humans. You will be able to connect and explore your own relationship to this practice and all the yummy sensations possible. Opt in event meaning you only do what you feel comfortable with.

*   Release the emotional baggage that accumulates in the body due to exposure to traumas in our life and causes us to suffer.
*   Experience a practice of yoga that is incredibly liberating
*   Re-set the nervous system and get a good physical work out for our bodies
*   Induce in ourselves a state of excellent and bliss-filled meditation.
*   Experience oneness (the goal of yoga)
*   FEEL FREE & HAVE FUN

**What to bring?**

*   Wear fun or fancy dressy dancy clothes (or be liberated to opt for your natural state) for your enjoyment. If you opt to wear clothes, be sure that they allow free movement and sitting comfortably in meditation.
*   Bring water or at least a water bottle
*   Bring meditation cushion and/or yoga mat. (mats are available if you don't have)

**Workshop Tickets:** Early Bird $30, Regular $40

**NOTE:** We encourage everyone to have an open mind as this is a fun, open and explorative learning environment. We practice and review informed & ongoing consent practices with an emphasis on mutual opt in desire. This workshop is open to all gender identifications, sexual orientations, lifestyles, and we do not pair anyone as we honor genuine connections that arise in the evening.

This event is perfect and open for all experience levels.18+ for workshops. Refunds must be requested 24hrs prior to the event. Doors open at 7:30pm and closes at 7:45 pm please be on time.

If you have any more questions about this practice, email Goddess Shakti at [esotericyoga@protonmail.com](mailto:esotericyoga@protonmail.com)

name: Spooky Sex Trivia Night
description:
Join us for a night of ridiculous and thought-provoking Sex Trivia with sexy prizes :)

Join us at the Greenpoint Beer and Ale Co. for a night of ridiculous and thought-provoking sex trivia, featuring spooky Halloween games and prizes! Our host and sex educator extraordinaire Niki Davis-Fainbloom will lead teams through a series of questions designed to challenge and educate about the human body, pleasure, and, most importantly, sex! Don’t miss out on the fun – it’s going to be a night full of tricks, treats, and a whole lot of laughs!

To ensure that you get seats, please arrive at 7pm - the event starts at 7:30 sharp. We will also be selling tickets at the door.

Host Bio

Niki Davis-Fainbloom (she/her) is a Canadian-born, New York–based sex educator, researcher, and coach. Her work uses up-to-date research, humor, and practical advice to assist people in developing the skills needed for healthier and more satisfying relationships. Since earning her master’s degree from NYU, she has facilitated more than 500 sexual education workshops at locations including Planned Parenthood, New York University, and the United Nations. Her writing has also been featured in Mind Body Green, Cosmopolitan, and The Insider and she is in the process of writing a book aimed at demystifying fetishes. Find her on Instagram @missbloomsexeducator

name: The Poetry Brothel Nyc: Bewitched, Bothered, And Bewildered
description:
**Description**

Join the Poetry Brothel NYC for a spellbinding evening of immersive literary cabaret.

**Event Details:**

*   **Doors Open:** 7:00 PM
*   **Showtime:** 8:00 -10:00 PM EST
*   **Venue:** House of Yes
*   **Dress Code:** Costumes, cocktail attire, and/or thematic evening wear are encouraged but not required.
*   **Age Requirement:** 21+

As Samhain approaches, the veil between the worldly and ghostly begins to thin in the delicious autumn air. Surrender yourself as The Poetry Brothel NYC immerses you in an evening of spellbinding cabaret.

In the heart of Bushwick, the artist haven House of Yes beckons you to step inside its enchanting walls. Adorned with bewitching fabrics, hypnotic scents, and curious oddities, the atmosphere will leave you spellbound. The stage serves as an altar for spoken word, burlesque, aerial performances, and live music, casting a spell on all who dare to enter.

Indulge your senses with an array of confections that tantalize your palate. Revel in the poetry of renowned wordsmiths, whose verses transcend the physical realm. Fall under the spell of the most celebrated burlesque artists as they call you to pay tribute at their altar. Approach with curiosity as you are lured into a secret room for a ritual cloaked in mystery. Join the wishing circles to fortify the magic of manifestation.

Our Maitre D', Chuckie Sleaze, and Madam Eleanor present a rotating cast of poets who share their work as purveyors of private poetry readings in secret, well-appointed chambers. You may select your poet of choice for tokens at any time during the event.

\--

**Consent Is Sexy**: Behave with beauty, connect with intention. We expect our patrons and staff to conduct themselves with grace and respect. We are, by and large, a no-contact event -- here to levitate your mind, heart, spirit, and nothing else! Always ask before touching anyone in our House, and report any discomfort to security or staff, Madam, or Maitre D' without delay.

This is a **wheelchair accessible** event (ask us how!). Our show includes flashing lights, reasonably amplified music, and fog machines.

The Poetry Brothel NYC is brought to you by **The Poetry Society of New York**. Please consider becoming a PSNY member for access to pre-sale specials, discounted and/or free tickets to future Poetry Brothel events, and tons of other perks. Learn more at [https://poetrysocietyny.org/join](https://poetrysocietyny.org/join).

**⫸ LOOKS**

Costumes, cocktail attire, and thematic/vintage formal wear are encouraged but not required.

If someone is making you uncomfortable, speak to a security guard or ask for a manager - we will help you, no judgment. All restrooms in our venue are gender neutral. name: Bamboo, Body, and Rope
description:
This class will teach ties that incorporate a thin bamboo stick by tying it against the body. The ties are designed to introduce an additional element of restriction, when tying on the floor, utilizing the rigidness of the bamboo stick as opposed to the very pliable quality of rope.

We start the class by techniques to attach rope, body and bamboo together well, as this can be a challenge as bamboo is a slippery surface to tie on. Then specific ties, with themes like posture, exposure and torment, are taught. Detailing matters of placement of bamboo along the body, with body mechanics in mind, to achieve the desired effect.

This is a mixed level class suitable for students confident in fundamental tying techniques; You need to be able to tie single column tie well, without teacher support, and have prior experience in attending Shibari classes or workshops. It is not recommended as an introduction to shibari. Switching roles between ties is welcome if both partners are capable, but not mandatory.

#### Tickets sold as pairs. $120 per tying pair

_$40 deposit, $80 cash at the start of class_

RSVP
----

#### If the event is sold out, you can sign up for a [WAITLIST HERE](https://forms.gle/r4beaT43sK8jxua8A)

_CANCELLATION POLICY: you can reschedule once or ask for a refund up to 48 hours before the event. If you would like a refund, please email us at temple.nyc.bushwick@gmail.com , and we will take care of it with you. A processing fee of 5% will be subtracted from all refunds. No refunds will be issued with less than 48 hours notice of cancellation._

_Payment processing note: You will see a charge to “Porter Cycles” when paying for all our events!_

#### **Bring**: 

*   4 ropes and 2 short pieces of about 4 meters each.
*   It is highly recommended that the ropes are loosely layered jute, sold for the purpose of Shibari specifically, as the class content is designed for this type of rope.
*   Bamboo sticks will be provided by Temple.

#### **Tam’s Bio:**

Tamandua is a Swedish rigger based in Berlin, Germany. He has been working with rope professionally, primarily through teaching and offering intimate sessions to clients, since 2016.

Although a rope top most of the time, he has broad experience as a rope bottom as well, and highly values ability to relate to both perspectives. He is a queer person, who appreciates tying with people of various gender. 

‘I consider kinbaku to be a complex erotic art, which is empathetically sadomasochistic at it’s core. Often tying in a way that can be challenging both for the one tying and the one in the ropes, my Shibari usually demands a lot of technical clarity when in the role of a teacher. At the same time, the student’s individuality is a priority when it comes to learning methods and intention. I view Kinbaku as a practice of continuous exploration – where new doors open as you go deeper and further with a partner, over the course of a session, or over the course of a long partnership. Sometimes though, the magic that defines Kinbaku can be just that one alluring image that sticks with you, a moment suspended in time. For me, the essence of Kinbaku lies in the meeting between the aesthetic expression and the emotional and sensual intention of the practice. And the more ones tying develop, the more seamlessly the parts can intermingle.’

Tamanduakinbaku.com

name: Aleah Black Book Release Dance Party @ Hit Me Up
description:
Aleah Black Book Release Dance Party @ Hit Me Up

_Public Event, 21+_

This Halloween, join **Aleah Black (Gendersauce)** to celebrate the release of their poetry book, **It Is Always A Circle**. Part poetry book, part coffee table art book, part spell book, It Is Always A Circle dives deep into the cycles that make up human experience. The poems track the reader’s journey from death into life, from despair into hope. Each page is filled with original linocuts, drawings, and poems. **Come for a book reading and signing with the author, and stay for a Halloween dance party.**

A portion of all profits from this event will be donated to “For the Gworls,” an organization that provides rent and medical bill assistance to Black trans folks.

Part poetry book, part coffee table art book, part spell book, It Is Always A Circle dives deep into the cycles that make up human experience. The poems track the reader’s journey from death into life, from despair into hope. Each page is filled with original linocuts, drawings, and poems.

This event is sponsored by [PFLAG](https://pflag.org/) NYC and will be a safe/welcoming event.

**About the Instructor**

[Aleah Black](http://www.aleahblack.org/) is an artist, educator, and fool. They make puppets and poems, teach adults and children, and cause a general ruckus. They delight in bringing magic, storytelling, and play to their New York City community and beyond.

**What to Expect**

7:00-8:00pm welcome & mixer

8:00-8:30pm reading by Aleah

9:00-1:00am dance party

**Volunteer for a Free Ticket**

We need lots of volunteers to help make this happen! Email [admin@hitmeupnyc.com](mailto:admin@hitmeupnyc.com) to join the team.

**Accessibility**

The venue is fully accessible via an elevator and has an accessible bathroom. There are stairs to go between floors, if you need accommodation for moving between floors please contact [hello@hitmeupnyc.com](mailto:hello@hitmeupnyc.com) and we will arrange elevator access for you.

**FAQ: what is the Halloween dress code/party theme?**

Fools, Devils, Angels, & Kings. Feel free to be one, a blend, or all of them. Please put in effort, minimum of all black clothing.

**FAQ: Hit Me Up is hosting this event. Is this a play event?**

Nope! This is a book reading and dance party.

**FAQ: How are you keeping this event safe and welcoming?**

There will be Guardians throughout the evening to make sure that everyone is experiencing a safe and consensual environment, including during the dance portion of the night. This event is fully wheelchair/mobility aid accessible and there will be a chill sensory zone on one of the floors throughout the night.

**FAQ : Can I buy the book at the event?**

Yes! Aleah Black will have copies of the book for purchase and to be signed.

description:
A mixer for poly & non-monogamous folks

It's Halloween, so we'll interrupt our usual version of Liaison by turning the energy up a few notches with DJs.

I invite you to my iteration of a munch/social event for the sex-positive community for Halloween Eve 2024! We are social beings; multiple studies have detailed that being involved in groups makes things better! We need friends and social interactions. In addition, social interactions are critical for our mental health. If you're a newcomer, we welcome you with open arms; Liaison will be the ideal introduction.

**Dress Code:** Your best Hallowwen costume

At Liaison, you'll be able to:

*   Develop confidence in social settings
*   Improve your person-to-person communication skills
*   Make emotional connections
*   Convey your feelings authentically
*   Meet new and fellow sex-positive folks
*   Play interactive games

Consenting adults can be affectionate, kiss, and fondle each other to their heart's desire. Meet new and seasoned non-monogamists, polyamorists, fetishists, dominants, submissives, and hedonists, to name a few.

### Workshops & Demo's

TBA

*   Entertainment

Your ears will be pleasantly treated by our live vocalist and pianist. We'll provide a wide selection of background music to keep everyone entertained.

**Attire:**

*   Be presentable and dress in whatever makes you feel confident, sexy, and comfortable. Lack of effort and you'll be refused entry.

### Code Of Conduct

*   Consent is the top priority.
*   You must not touch anyone or their belongings without consenting first.
*   Consent can be given or taken away at any time.
*   Do not drink to the point of intoxication. If you get too drunk, we will send you home and restrict you from future events if necessary.
*   You'll receive a lifetime ban for any racist, prejudiced, Slut-shaming, homophobic, or transphobic behavior. No exceptions.
*   Be courteous, smile, and respect people's boundaries.

### Entree

$30 at the door. If ticket sales end online, you can show up and pay cash at the door.

www.consensualevents.com

### ID (21+) is required for entry

### Transportation

We're conveniently a short walking distance from the J, M & Z at Myrtle Avenue Station.

name: Barbies Dreamhouse Of Horror: Halloween
description:
**Description**

**COME ON BARBlE, LET'S GET GO PARTY!** Welcome to BARBlE'S DREAMHOUSE OF HORROR, where the pink paradise takes a dark, twisted turn. Experience your own existential crisis—doll style—as the perfect plastic dream cracks under the pressure of eerie shadows and haunted hallways. Dance your fears away in a neon nightmare, surrounded by surreal installations and spine-chilling surprises in a kaleidoscopic carnival of terror. Embrace your inner scream queen and play with identity in this sinister pink playground. It's a celebration of the weird, the wild, and the wonderfully wicked. Forget your perfect persona and let your dark side take the spotlight.

**⫸ LOOKS**

Halloween, but BARBlE · Slasher chic · Striped sweaters and fedora hats · Clawed gloves and blood-red accents · Nightmare-inspired fashion · Distressed and deconstructed fabrics · Horror makeup with a glam twist

description:
House of Scorpio

presents

Taste The Rainbow: sex-positive kinky poly LGBTQ+ mixer

Friday November 1\* (please note date change), 7pm-12am, 21+ (25+ suggested)

For existing & prospective HoS members; members: $0 / non-members: $10

Gemini & Scorpio Loft, 267 Douglass St, 3rd fl (ADA accessible)

Official info & house rules: http://www.houseofscorpio.com/events.html

Memberships & tix: http://www.houseofscorpio.com/membership.html (log in for member tix)

FB: https://www.facebook.com/events/545875987833271

FL: https://fetlife.com/events/1616315

PL: https://plra.io/m/taste-the-rainbow-sex-positive-kinky-poly-lgbtq-277

Socials: @houseof\_scorpio \[producer\] @gemini\_scorpio \[venue\] #houseofscorpio

We get asked all the time how people can join HoS if they are shy, don't have like-minded friends, lack PALs for play parties, have no idea how this whole thing works, don't feel like jumping into sexy activity but want to connect to open-minded humans, etc. This party is the answer!

Calling all LGBTQIA+, poly, kink, swinger and other "alternative" dating/sex/gender-aligned humans and their allies. We're creating a protected and judgment-free space for connections, conversations, community, games and interactivity. This is the key HoS event open to non-members. Come meet us before you join!

For those of you new to it all: direct introductions to HoS members new and old; facilitated discussions on poly, kink and swinger lifestyles; icebreaker games to welcome you to our club.

For our regulars: a way to ease new friends into our scene; a chance to meet all the new faces you may want to kiss later; a visit with the community even if your PAL is not around.

For everyone: tabletop and social games, both risqué and plain fun; a charming host to make the introductions and explain all things HoS and sex-positive, and a cozy setting for conversations and future kisses. Our main icebreaker game, HoS Guest Bingo, runs from 7:30pm until we have a winner: get to know everyone in the room, and win a drink if you complete your bingo card.

Miss Scorpio is back hosting the mixer! Come ask her directly anything you want to know about this community. We've been building it for you for 10+ years, and hope to be here for 10+ more.

HoS rules: HoS membership, PAL and dress code not required; no prior approval required; Code of Conduct always applies; no photos except in the designated front area.

COVID safety: HoS requires proof of vaccination on file; masks encouraged; windows will be partially open for ventilation; two hospital grade UV air purifiers will cycle the air.

\*Taste The Rainbow happens every first Thursday of the month except when a month starts on Friday (otherwise it would end up the night before Lip Service).

name: Apocalypse NYC
description:
#### Event Details

*   **Outside the world is ending, inside it's a party...**
*   **From the minds of international directors Alexander Raptotasios (Athens’ Hotel Apocalypse, London’s Antigone \[on strike\] ) and Reginald Robson (London's The Box, NYC's Hypnotique) comes an immersive theatrical spectacle to bring in the end-times - just 4 days before the election. Hosted by London's Séayoncé, and featuring Ché (Netflix's KAOS) and world-renowned foot archer Orissa Kelly, APOCALYPSE NYC is a jaw dropping, drink spilling ritual of hedonism, catharsis and parody. Are you ready to let it all go?**
*   **After successful runs in London, Athens and NYC, Apocalypse NYC returns to 3 Dollar Bill in Brooklyn, removing contemporary theatre from purpose-built venues and mixing theatre and nightlife audiences. A creative team of international writers, actors, Bushwick voguers, nightlife royalty, performance artists and London’s most mystical drag queen come together inspired by the writings of Carl Sagan, Yuval Harrari and our obsessively post-apocalyptic pop culture. All to create a new way for experiencing theatre and possibly…rebirth.**
*   **Doors: 20:30Show: 9pmDress Code: Whatever do you wanna die in.**
*   **STARRING Séayoncé, Orissa Kelly, Ché (Netflix’s KAOS), Scott Gordon, Gianna Kiehl, Summer Reign, Paris L'homme, Golden Gucci + MYSTERY GUEST who will make Armageddon great again…**
*   **DJ: DROPO**
*   **CREATIVE TEAMDirector / Creator: Alexander RaptotasiosAssociate Director: Reginald RobsonProduced by MAYDAYProduction team: Gianna Kiehl & Scott GordonCostume Supervisor: Marie-Cecile Inglesi**
