name: Tantric Massage Master Class (Tribeca, New York)
description:
Embark on a weekend journey into the art of Tantric/Sensual Massage, elevated to its pinnacle of sophistication and potency!

### NOTICE: Tickets for this event have been moved over to a new platform. [Please visit this link to purchase tickets.](https://app.promotix.com/events/details/Tantric-Massage-Master-Class-NewYork)

### **DISCOVER A NEW DIMENSION OF INTIMACY!**

#### **TANTRIC MASSAGE MASTER CLASS!**

> **A Steamy Weekend Adventure in New York City.**

#### **Embark on a weekend journey into the art of T@ntric/Sensu@l Massage, elevated to its pinnacle of sophistication and potency!**

### **Saturday March 29th & Sunday March 30th**

#### **10:00am - 6:30pm**

*   **OPEN TO SINGLES & COUPLES!**
*   **SECURE YOUR SPOT NOW!**
*   **SPACE LIMITED TO ONLY 12 PAIRINGS**
*   **Early registration is recommended as this workshop SELLS-OUT CONSISTENTLY!**

Join us for an enlightening exploration of an **INNOVATIVE & POWERFUL "ENERGY-BASED"** T@ntric Mass@ge System. This unique approach sets itself apart from conventional T@ntric and Sensu@l Mass@ge techniques, promising an experience unlike any other.

Perhaps you've dabbled in T@ntric Mass@ge before, but now is your chance to ascend to new heights and encounter the most advanced and refined system available, all within the dynamic and enjoyable ambiance of this intimate workshop!

**Scroll down for LOCATION, SCHEDULE, and OTHER VITAL INFORMATION**

These "Energy-Based" techniques have been meticulously crafted from a blended formula of dedicated energetics based martial arts training and an in-depth study of "Human Energetics."

**THE FLOW of this workshop is designed to transport you on a shamanic, "OTHER-WORLDLY, SENSUAL & ER@TIC JOURNEY."**

Benefit from the expertise of a well seasoned and innovative instructor, guiding you through a detailed, profound, and enjoyable weekend experience whether you come alone or with a partner.

Immerse yourself in a potent and undeniably "SUPER HOT" Sensu@l Massage System, seamlessly blending ancient T@ntric techniques with modern twists and "Energetic Principles."

**WHAT YOU'LL GAIN:**

*   A THOUGHTFULLY DEVELOPED "CODIFIED SEQUENCE" of over 30 massage techniques, skillfully designed to cultivate Sensual & Er@tic Energy.
*   GENDER-SPECIFIC STROKES for a personalized touch.
*   THE ART OF UTILIZING ENERGY to subtly heighten arousal levels.
*   MASTERING YOUR WHOLE BODY AS A MASSAGE TOOL.
*   UNIQUE TECHNIQUES for indirect ER@TIC AROUSAL.
*   T@NTRIC RITUAL to enhance the massage experience.
*   UTILIZING VARIOUS SENSUAL STIMULATION TOOLS.
*   _A step-by-step OUTLINE for a 1-HOUR T@NTRIC MASS@GE SESSION._
*   Receive a comprehensive 20+ page booklet of WORKSHOP NOTES!
*   Engage in Tai Chi & Tantra Yoga ENERGY EXERCISES to infuse your hands with vital "CHI" energy for the massage.

**\*\* NO PRIOR EXPERIENCE REQUIRED! \*\***

**WHO WILL BENEFIT:**

*   **SINGLES:** Elevate your "Pleasure Giving Skills" to dazzle your dates!
*   **COUPLES:** Deepen the sensuality and intimacy in your relationship.
*   **PROFESSIONALS:** T@ntric & Sensu@l Massage practitioners seeking to elevate their offerings, stand out from the competition, and attract more "repeat customers" and "enthusiastic referrals"!

This is the \*\* **ULTIMATE FOREPLAY** \*\* - Gift your partner a "Deeply Sensu@l & Super Hot" Massage!

Crafted by amalgamating various arts, these "Sensu@l T@ntric Mass@ge" techniques seamlessly blend elements of:

*   Nuru Massage
*   Taoist Er@tic Mass@ge
*   Thai Massage
*   5 Elements T@ntra Mass@ge
*   Deep Tissue/Swedish Massage
*   Sensu@l Energetics
*   Tai Chi
*   Exclusive Sensu@l Stimulation techniques

These powerful and effective techniques have enhanced the sensu@l and er@tic experiences for both men and women. Learn them and witness the transformation in your love life! _(Check out the testimonials below)_

**ENERGY EXCHANGE:**

*   TIER 1: $495 Solo/$895 Paired - early bird
*   TIER 2: $595 Solo/$1195 Paired - regular price
*   TIER 3: $695 Solo/$1395 Paired - last minute

**A NOTE ABOUT PRICE TIERS:** There are 3 price tiers with a limited # of tickets available at each tier. When Tier 1 sells out then Tier 2 is what's available.. and so on.

**QUESTIONS:**

**email:** [contact@shivaj.com](mailto:contact@ShivaJ.com)

**COMMUNITY SUPPORT:** If you can comfortably afford to purchase your ticket at a higher tier....we encourage you to do so as that will make a lower tiered ticket available for someone in the community who may be in need of it due to their financial status. Thank you so much for kindly considering this

**SOLO MALES**: This is a gender-balanced event and solo males must purchase a "Solo Male" ticket. The first couple of solo males will be "confirmed automatically"... after that, if registering alone, you will be placed on a waiting list. Your space in the event will be confirmed as soon as a matching solo female registers. If you are unable to be confirmed, your money will be fully refunded electronically the day after the event. Of course, another option is for you to find someone to register with as a pair.

**A NOTE ABOUT GENITAL CONTACT:** There is no direct "Manual-Genital Massage" in this workshop... that is the specialization taught in a different course. However there is some "Genital Brushing"... where a part of the giver's body (for example, a forearm or a thigh) may brush with light to moderate pressure across the genitals of the receiver. This happens at very specific points in the massage sequence to activate & circulate the receivers sexual energy throughout "their own body". As with "any" exercise in this workshop, this is totally optional (as stated above) and if you desire not to experience this, the technique can be easily modified to fit your individual boundaries.

**\*ALL SOLO PARTICIPANTS (Female & Male):** This class is "gender-balanced" and usually filled with about 50-60% "SOLO" male & female participants.

**ALL SOLO PARTICIPANTS** will be pairing up with a different solo participant of the opposite gender for each morning and afternoon session (3-4 hours in length) throughout the workshop. This is particularly helpful for learning the correct dynamics for effectively applying the techniques on different people (for example certain techniques need to be adjusted to be applied on a tall person as opposed to a shorter person etc.).

**NOTE:** For the workshop to run smoothly, if you begin the workshop as a "Solo" participant (male or female) you will need to remain in that status throughout the duration of the workshop and change to a new practice partner of the opposite gender at every rotation point (every 3-4 hours).

**IMPORTANT:** if you desire to work with a same gender partner you will need to attend as a pair. We truly wish it weren't the case, but unfortunately after many tries, it has turned out be too logistically complicated to accomplish within the rotating group of solo participants 🙏💗

**SAME SEX COUPLES** are warmly invited to attend as a pair.

**IMPORTANT NOTES:**

*   This is a "heart centered....touch positive....super-fun"... and information-rich workshop.
*   All personal boundaries will be Lovingly respected!
*   All exercises are optional or "negotiable".
*   You are welcome to wear a Covid mask if you wish.
*   Open to SINGLES & COUPLES.
*   COUPLES may do all exercises together if they wish.
*   SAME SEX COUPLES are welcome to attend as a pair.

**MORE DETAILS:**

*   **CLOTHING:** Please dress so as to have as much skin exposed as possible (Women could wear thong bottom & bikini top & Men could wear a thong, briefs or boxers... nudity is also very acceptable and in fact encouraged.
*   **PLEASE BRING:** (1) a sheet (2) a large towel & small hand towel (3) Massage oil (coconut oil?) preferably in a spill-proof dispenser! (4) Wet-Wipes (5) A bag lunch each day. Note that there will not be enough time to "go out" for lunch and we invite you to bring something to share with the group to help foster connection and community during our two days together.
*   **MONEY BACK GUARANTEE:** I am confident that you will receive valuable skills, have plenty of Fun and feel enriched by this highly detailed journey....OR... your $$ back (minus any 3rd party processing fees... Must be requested within a week of the workshop completion). Seriously......I am absolutely committed to everyone's happiness, personal growth & satisfaction!
*   **CANCELLATION POLICY:** 7 days notice required for a full refund (minus any 3rd party processing fees). After that point, I am happy to offer 50% of your registration as credit towards any of my future events.
*   **BOUNDARIES:** We will create a "safe space" where everyone’s individual boundaries will be lovingly respected...…and all exercises are by personal choice only! This event is carefully designed so that attendees can choose to participate at the level that feels comfortable to them in each moment..…. and…..the conditions will be created for each person to play with and expand their boundaries at their own pace. You are invited to be in control of your own journey.

### **MORE INFO can be found at:**

[https://shivaj.com/tantricmassagemasterclass/](https://shivaj.com/tantricmassagemasterclass/)

**ABOUT YOUR FACILITATOR:**

**~ Shiva J** is a Certified Tantra Educator, Kundalini Yoga Instructor, Somatic Bodyworker, Certified Life Coach, Licensed Clinical Hypnotherapist, and Master NLP Practitioner who has been in the world of transformational work since 2003.

With a 20+ year career in the fitness world under his belt he suddenly found himself with a severe back injury that prevented him from continuing on that path. Around the same time he found himself facing divorce, bankruptcy and homelessness. Determined to rise from these pitfalls he began to study holistic wellness, and Tantra to help heal his body, mind and spirit. Having prevailed over a rather bleak and almost hopeless dark night of the soul he experienced a spiritual awakening and discovered his true calling as a healer, and community builder.

With his unique perspective of the mind, body, spirit connection he has helped thousands of clients transform their lives. He combines all of these unique tools along with his gift of insight to help his clients overcome any physical or mental challenge they may be currently experiencing in their lives.

When not at work doing what he loves, Shiva J can be found at a local internet cafe sipping a dirty chai latte, attending ecstatic dancing, a drum circle, or out hiking or biking local trails and if you can't find him at all, he has probably taken a sabbatical and gone hiking or camping someplace more exotic!

**Shiva J is available for private sessions, workshops and retreats.**

[www.ShivaJ.com](http://www.shivaj.com)

[www.TheSacredKings.com](http://www.thesacredkings.com)

[www.TheHeartCenteredBeing.com](https://www.TheHeartCenteredBeing.com)

**Facilitator** [Tantra Speed Date® San Diego](https://www.tantrany.com/tantra-speed-date/?region=sd&aff=7jj)
